rule: The chosen category for classification must be clearly representational and consistent with the core subject matter of the input text as it fits within the provided category definitions.
input: World Health Organization warns of new pandemic threats
validityText:
The input is a string that represents a news headline. It clearly falls into the "World" category as it pertains to a global organization (World Health Organization) and addresses an issue with potential worldwide impact (pandemic threats). This input meets the input specification requirements of being a string, being in English, and representing a news-related topic that falls within one of the specified categories (World, Sports, Business, Sci/Tech). There are no violations of the input specification.

OK
